mapper.select: SELECT TP.POST_ID , TP.USER_ID , TU.USER_NM , TP.POST_TTL , TP.POST_CNT , TP.RGST_DT , TP.UPDT_DT FROM TB_POST TP INNER JOIN TB_USER TU ON (TP.USER_ID = TU.USER_ID) WHERE TP.POST_ID = #{postId} ORDER BY RGST_DT DESC
SELECT FILE_ID , FILE_ORG_NM , FILE_SIZE FROM TB_FILE WHERE POST_ID = #{postId}
SELECT FILE_ID , FILE_ORG_NM , FILE_SAVE_NM , FILE_SIZE , FILE_PATH FROM TB_FILE WHERE FILE_ID = #{fileId}
